Thanks April. I also don't understand the vehemence of the comments to me.=
=C2=A0=C2=A0 All I can figure, is that some people here have had their deep=
ly held beliefs attacked previously by those calling themselves or acting l=
ike skeptics or scientists.=C2=A0 They compare me to them, and so connect m=
y tests and questions as heralding more attacks on their beliefs.

I don't =
in the least condone attacking people's beliefs, much less attacking them p=
ersonally (as unfortunately people here are attacking me now).

      Fo=
r the record, I appreciate RJ's contribution here, and what he is trying to=
 accomplish with these tests. No one should have any problem not the skepti=
cs, nor the believers. The outcome of the tests won't mean anything to anyo=
ne except those who wish to remain objective. I do not understand why some =
people here are so threatened by these tests.


On Thu, Aug 19, 2010 at 12:=
03 PM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:
















=C2=A0



  


    
 =
     
      
      What have I said or done for you to attack me like this?=

Is it because I don't believe everything you do? I don't attack you becaus=
e of that.

So why do you feel it necessary to attack me?
